akn:section.akn:heading: Annual assessment of cattle and hog industries

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 228d. Annual assessment of cattle and hog industries Not later than March 1 of each year, the Secretary shall submit to Congress and make publicly available a report that—(1) assesses the general economic state of the cattle and hog industries;
(2) describes changing business practices in those industries; and
(3) identifies market operations or activities in those industries that appear to raise concerns under this chapter.
(Aug. 15, 1921, ch. 64, title IV, § 415, as added Pub. L. 106–472, title III, § 312(e)(2), Nov. 9, 2000, 114 Stat. 2077.)
